title: Chicken fajita sandwiches
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '6 (170g) skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, thinly sliced', '1 small onion, sliced', '1/2 red pepper, sliced', '125ml tomato juice', '2 tablespoons taco seasoning spice mix', '250ml tomato salsa', '8 (1cm thick) slices crusty bread', '225g grated Cheddar cheese']
